subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर में किस पसंदीदा फोट है।
explanation_en:
Hawa Mahal is a famous fort located in Jaipur, known for its unique architecture.
Explanation in Hindi: हावा महाल जयपुर में इसका विशेष काम करता है, इसकी विशेष विभिज्ञान के लिए है।
explanation_hi: हावा महाल जयपुर में इसका विशेष काम करता है, इसकी विभिज्ञान के लिए है।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the founder of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान के निर्वाणी कौने बने थे?
explanation_en: Pratap Singh was the founder of Rajasthan. In Hindi, it can be explained as Rao Pratap Singh राउज्डूंग राजस्थान का निर्वाणी राउज्डूंग
explanation_hi: Rao Pratap Singh राउज्डूंग राजस्थान का निर्वाणी

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the first Rana of Mewar?
question_hi: मैयर के पहले राणे कौन थे?
explanation_en: Pratap Singh was the first Rana of Mewar. In Hindi, it can be explained as प्रताप सिंग मैयर के पहले राणे थे।
explanation_hi: प्रताप सिंग मैयर के पहले राणे थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the first Maharaja of Jaipur?
explanation_en: Jait Singh was the first Maharaja of Jaipur. In Hindi, it can be explained as सवाई जयत जयपर सिंग

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the first Chauhan Rajput Rana of Jaipur?
explanation_en: Rao Mandawal was the first Chauhan Rajput Rana of Jaipur.
